short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text on websites with President Trump's preferred nicknames. Based on the Cloud to Butt Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces various words with President Trump's preferred nicknames.

Currently, it replaces "ISIS" with "Evil Losers" and "Hillary Clinton" with "Crooked Hillary"

Enjoy!
